Message: How to set the backend language to Chinese

To set the backend language to Chinese on News Break, you can follow these steps:
1. Open the News Break app.
2. Go to the 'Me' tab.
3. Look for the language settings option.
4. Select Chinese from the list of available languages.
For more detailed instructions, you can refer to this article: [https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/ko/articles/4414718303245-NewsBreak-%EC%95%B1%EC%9D%84-%EB%8B%A4%EB%A5%B8-%EC%96%B8%EC%96%B4%EB%A1%9C-%EC%84%A4%EC%A0%95%ED%95%A0-%EC%88%98-%EC%9E%88%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/ko/articles/4414718303245-NewsBreak-%EC%95%B1%EC%9D%84-%EB %8B%A4 %EB %A5 %B8 - % EC % 96 % B8 % EC % 96 % B4 % EB % A1 % 9C - % EC % 84 % A4 % EC % A0 )
